title: Mr. Mine
description: Mr. Mine is an addictive idle mining clicker arcade game that puts you in charge of building a mining empire from the ground up! Start by drilling deep into the Earth’s crust, extracting valuable minerals and hidden treasures. With each click, you’ll uncover riches that can be sold to fund the expansion and upgrading of your mining operations. As your business grows, you’ll be able to unlock new technologies and hire workers to dig even deeper, inching ever closer to the Earth’s core.
